> npm run build && node ./dist/App.js ./src/__test__/testdata/E2E/test.yml ./src/__test__/testdata/E2E/test.csv


> stmt_viewer@1.0.0 build
> esbuild src/App.ts --platform=node --bundle --outfile=dist/App.js
